id.label: Task ID
id.explainer: Unique identifier for the warehouse task. This UUID is automatically generated for each task configuration.

whId.label: Warehouse ID
whId.explainer: Numeric identifier for the warehouse where this task will be executed.

taskKind.label: Task Kind
taskKind.explainer: The type of warehouse task. Changing this will auto-populate fields with appropriate defaults for the selected task type.

taskSubKind.label: Task Sub-Kind
taskSubKind.explainer: Optional sub-classification for more specific task categorization.

sequence.label: Sequence
sequence.explainer: Execution order priority. Lower numbers execute first.

taskLabel.label: Task Label
taskLabel.explainer: Human-readable label for the task. Use '-' for default.

scanSourceHUKind.label: Scan Source HU Kind
scanSourceHUKind.explainer: Type of handling unit scanning required at source.

pickSourceHUKind.label: Pick Source HU Kind
pickSourceHUKind.explainer: Type of handling unit for picking operations.

carrierHUKind.label: Carrier HU Kind
carrierHUKind.explainer: Type of handling unit for carrying/transport.

groupBy.label: Group By
groupBy.explainer: Array of fields to group tasks by for batch processing.

huKinds.label: HU Kinds
huKinds.explainer: Array of handling unit types that this task can process.

dropHUInBin.label: Drop HU in Bin
dropHUInBin.explainer: Allow dropping handling units directly into bins.

scanDestHUInDrop.label: Scan Destination HU in Drop
scanDestHUInDrop.explainer: Require scanning destination handling unit during drop operations.

allowHUBreakInDrop.label: Allow HU Break in Drop
allowHUBreakInDrop.explainer: Allow breaking handling units during drop operations.

strictBatchAdherence.label: Strict Batch Adherence
strictBatchAdherence.explainer: Enforce strict adherence to batch requirements during task execution.

allowWorkOrderSplit.label: Allow Work Order Split
allowWorkOrderSplit.explainer: Allow splitting work orders across multiple tasks or workers.

undoOp.label: Undo Operation
undoOp.explainer: Enable undo functionality for task operations.

enableEditQtyInPickOp.label: Enable Edit Quantity in Pick Operation
enableEditQtyInPickOp.explainer: Allow editing quantities during pick operations.
